# Hugo Ferrer - UX/UI Designer Portfolio

## About

Hugo Ferrer is a Lead UX/UI Designer based in Paris, France.
Specializes in: Government digital services, SaaS B2B platforms, 
e-learning, accessibility (RGAA/WCAG), Design Systems (DSFR).

## Key Projects

- Gouvernement.fr: Complete redesign focusing on accessibility and DSFR design system implementation. Improved user experience for government information access.

- AgoraSquare: B2B platform redesign for Rungis market wholesalers. Digital transformation combining order management, solvency checks, electronic invoicing, and accounting.

- GoMind: Complete website redesign for a GreenIT-focused ESN. Created modern visual identity, AI mascot generator, and design system to improve B2B client acquisition.

- Master Coach: Full artistic direction for an EdTech platform allowing coaches to sell training and digital products. Created showcase website and video content.
